Reference

All functions

arrange(<skim_df>)

Use dplyr verb arrange on skim_df objects.

filter(<skim_df>)

Use dplyr verb filter on skim_df objects.

fix_windows_histograms()

Fix unicode histograms on Windows

kable()

Create tables in LaTeX, HTML, Markdown and reStructuredText

mutate(<skim_df>)

Use dplyr verb mutate on skim_df objects.

pander() pander.skim_df() pander.summary_skim_df()

Render data frames as markdown

print(<skim_df>) print(<skim_vector>) print(<summary_skim_df>)

Print skim objects

select(<skim_df>)

Use dplyr verb select on skim_df objects.

skim() skim_tee()

Skim a data frame, getting useful summary statistics

skim_format() skim_format_defaults() show_formats()

Change the formatting options for printed skim objects

skim_with() skim_with_defaults() show_skimmers() get_skimmers()

Set or add the summary functions for a particular type of data

skimr-package

Skim a data frame

slice(<skim_df>)

Use dplyr verb slice on skim_df objects.

n_missing() n_complete() sorted_count() inline_hist() n_empty() min_char() max_char() n_unique() ts_start() ts_end() inline_linegraph() list_lengths_min() list_lengths_median() list_lengths_max() list_min_length() list_max_length()

Summary statistic functions

summary(<skim_df>)

Summary function for skim_df

skim_to_wide() skim_to_list()

Working with skimr's printed output
